title: KAWO KOSTOMA
ctaTextShort: Samu Tsarin Kasuwa KYAUTA na Shekara-daya!
ctaText: Samo abokai guda 10 domin yin rajistar shafin su sai asamu tsarin Kasuwa na PLUSfree na shekara daya.
chooseApp: Zabi manhajar da za'a tura gayyata...
copyContent: Ko a shiga "Kwafi hanya" sai a rarraba hanyar zuwa ga abokai.
howToShare: Da zaran aboki ya shiga hanyar kuma yayi rajista za'a ga yawan ya karu a sama.
nowEligible: Ka cancanci samun kyautar tsarin Kasuwa na PLUS na shekara 1.
step3: Duk lokacin da wanda ka nemo ya danna kuma yayi rajista, zaka matso kusa da samun shiga tsarin kyauta!
msgContentShort:
Slm, 
shiga ka duba ARTMO.  
Zaiyi kyau idan zamu hadu aciki, kayataccen wajen zane mai tattare da abubuwan sha'awa.  
Ina jiran ka :) Cigaba da zumunci
msgContent:
Slm, na turo maka wannan cikin sauri...
 
Kalli shafina na ARTMO. 
 
Zaiyi kyau idan zamu hadu aciki, kayataccen wajen zane mai tattare da abubuwan sha'awa. Zamu hadu sai mubi juna. 
 Would be great :) Ina jiran faruwan hakan. 
Cigaba da zumunci
